mapper.select:
select g.*, c.name as categoryName, f.name as factory, u1.name as unitName, u2.name as packUnitName from goods g left join good_category c on g.category_id = c.id left join factory f on g.factory_id = f.id left join unit u1 on g.unit = u1.id left join unit u2 on g.unit = u2.id where 1 = 1 and g.id in
#{id}

big_pack = #{bigPack,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pinyin = #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
